description: To make a Fig&nbsp;Espresso Martini, you'll need an espresso bean garnish, a cocktail shaker,&nbsp;vodka, Kahlua, crème de cacao, and Coffig as an espresso alternative.Coffig smells and tastes incredibly good and has a sweet aroma. See the recipe note for some pro-level pointers for getting that lovely foam on top.
name: Fig Espresso Martini
recipeIngredient: 4 oz. Vanilla vodka or regular vodka if you don't have vanilla

recipeInstructions.name: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice for at least 20 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice for at least 20 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a martini glass and serve.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a martini glass and serve.

recipeInstructions.name: If you shake the mixture vigorously enough, there should be enough foam on top to hold 3 coffee beans as a garnish.
